description: This file defines REST API endpoints for content management using FastAPI. It includes route definitions for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting content items, with dependencies on a ContentService.

methods.name: get_content_service
methods.description: Dependency provider for ContentService, used for injecting the service into route handlers

methods.name: get_content
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve a specific content item by ID.

methods.name: create_content
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new content item.

methods.name: update_content
methods.description: Endpoint to update an existing content item.

methods.name: delete_content
methods.description: Endpoint to delete a content item.
